title: Manufacturing Dissent With Matt Taibbi
description: A well-functioning capitalism needs a well-functioning democracy which depends on a well-functioning media. So, is our media functioning well today...has it ever? To talk through this question, we sit down with renowned journalist and media critic, Matt Taibbi.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (University of Chicago Podcast Network)
